welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Los Chiles, Costa Rica! Known for its stunning natural beauty and vibrant culture, we invite you to immerse yourself in our charming city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Los Chiles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Los Chiles Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Carlos Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Carlos Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
